meta.title: Sahara Brass - Precision Brass Components | Manufacturing Excellence
meta.description: Leading precision brass component manufacturer serving automotive, HVAC, and industrial sectors with high-quality engineering solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Transform your project with our precision brass manufacturing expertise and comprehensive solutions.

items.answer: We accommodate orders from small prototype runs to large-scale production, with flexible minimum order quantities tailored to your project needs.
items.question: What are your minimum order requirements?

items.answer: Typical lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush services are available for urgent projects.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001 and Six Sigma standards, with rigorous quality control processes ensuring each component meets precise specifications.
items.question: How do you ensure product quality?

items.answer: Our engineering team specializes in custom solutions, offering design consultation, prototyping, and tailored manufacturing for unique requirements.
items.question: Can you handle custom component designs?

items.answer: We work with various brass alloys, including C360, C385, and naval brass, selecting materials based on specific application requirements.
items.question: What brass materials do you use?
